00067 volatile U8 cpt_sof;
00068 extern U8    rx_counter;
00069 extern U8    tx_counter;
00070 extern volatile U8 usb_request_break_generation;
00071 
00072 S_line_coding line_coding;
00073 S_line_status line_status;      // for detection of serial state input lines
00074 S_serial_state serial_state;   // for serial state output lines
00075 
00076 volatile U8 rs2usb[10];
00077 
00078 
00087 void cdc_task_init(void)
00088 {
00089    uart_init();
00090    Uart_enable_it_rx();
00091    Leds_init();
00092    Joy_init();
00093    Hwb_button_init();
00094    Usb_enable_sof_interrupt();
00095 #ifdef __GNUC__
00096    fdevopen((int (*)(char, FILE*))(uart_usb_putchar),(int (*)(FILE*))uart_usb_getchar); //for printf redirection
00097 #endif
00098 }
00099 
00100 
00101 
00109 void cdc_task(void)
00110 {
00111       
00112    if(Is_device_enumerated() && line_status.DTR) //Enumeration processs OK and COM port openned ?
00113         {
00114       if (Uart_tx_ready())    //USART free ?
00115       {
00116          if (uart_usb_test_hit())   // Something received from the USB ?
00117          {
00118              while (rx_counter)
00119             {
00120                uart_putchar(uart_usb_getchar());   // loop back USB to USART
00121                Led1_toggle();
00122             }
00123          }
00124       }
00125 
00126       if ( cpt_sof>=REPEAT_KEY_PRESSED)   //Debounce joystick events
00127       {
00128          if (Is_joy_select()) {
00129          printf ("Select Pressed !\r\n");
00130          }
00131          if (Is_joy_right()) {
00132             printf ("Right Pressed !\r\n");
00133             serial_state.bDCD = TRUE;
00134          }
00135          else
00136             serial_state.bDCD = FALSE;
00137 
00138          if (Is_joy_left()) {
00139             printf ("Left Pressed !\r\n");
00140             serial_state.bDSR = TRUE;
00141          }
00142          else
00143             serial_state.bDSR = FALSE;
00144 
00145          if (Is_joy_down())
00146          printf ("Down Pressed !\r\n");
00147 
00148          if (Is_joy_up())
00149          printf ("Up Pressed !\r\n");
00150 
00151          if(Is_hwb())
00152          printf("Hello from ATmega32U4 !\r\n");
00153          
00154          cdc_update_serial_state();
00155       }
00156 
00157       if(usb_request_break_generation==TRUE)
00158       {
00159          usb_request_break_generation=FALSE;
00160          Led2_toggle();
00161          start_boot();
00162       }
00163    }
00164 }
00165 
00177 void sof_action()
00178 {
00179    cpt_sof++;
00180 }
00181 
00182 
00188 #ifdef __GNUC__
00189  ISR(USART1_RX_vect)
00190 #else
00191 #pragma vector = USART1_RX_vect
00192 __interrupt void usart_receive_interrupt()
00193 #endif
00194 {
00195    U8 i=0;
00196    U8 save_ep;
00197    
00198    if(Is_device_enumerated()) 
00199    {
00200       save_ep=Usb_get_selected_endpoint();   
00201       Usb_select_endpoint(TX_EP);
00202       do 
00203       {
00204          if(Uart_rx_ready())
00205          {
00206             rs2usb[i]=Uart_get_byte();
00207             i++;
00208          }
00209       }while(Is_usb_write_enabled()==FALSE );
00210       uart_usb_send_buffer((U8*)&rs2usb,i);
00211       Usb_select_endpoint(save_ep);
00212    }
00213 }
